amendment.description: To provide for a Texas Rice safeguard initiative.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2135 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2135 proposed by Senator Bennett for Senator Hutchison. (consideration: CR S14145; text: CR S14145) To provide for a Texas Rice safeguard initiative.
